remarks: The multiplicative inverse in a division ring is nonzero.  ( ~ recne0 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement:
invrcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
invrcl.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
invrcl.i $e |- I = ( invr ` R ) $.
drnginvrn0 $p |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ X e. B /\ X =/= .0. ) -> ( I ` X ) =/= .0. ) $.
